name: Tricep Dip
description: Sit on the edge of a bench or sturdy chair with hands gripping the edge beside your hips. Slide your hips off the edge with legs extended or bent at 90 degrees for easier variation. Lower your body by bending elbows to about 90 degrees, keeping elbows pointed back. Push through your palms to return to start. Keep your back close to the bench throughout.
